snippet: China escalated its quarrel with the Philippines over an island in the South China Sea, halting Philippine bananas at customs for longer inspections.
abstract: China escalates its quarrel with the Philippines over an island in the South China Sea, halting Philippine bananas at customs for longer inspections and starting an official media campaign that suggests that any claims on the island represent an infringement of Chinese sovereignty; renewed tension appears to be result of China's growing interest in the South China Sea, which offers a promising source of oil and gas.
lead_paragraph: China escalated its quarrel with the Philippines over an island in the South China Sea, halting Philippine bananas at customs for longer inspections.

headline.seo: China-Philippines Dispute Over Island Becomes More Heated
headline.main: Dispute Between China and Philippines Over Island Becomes More Heated
headline.print_headline: Dispute Between China and Philippines Over Island Becomes More Heated
